channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Winter weather disrupts air traffic in New Jersey and New York
item.description: Nearly 15,000 flights were canceled or delayed as both states declared weather emergencies after snowstorm A mix of snow and ice bore down on the US n...

item.title: Zelenskyy to hold talks with European leaders amid fresh strikes on Kyiv
item.description: Attacks leave hundreds of thousands in city without heating as Ukrainian leader prepares for flurry of weekend diplomacy A third of Kyiv is without he...

item.title: Southern California cleans up after the wettest Christmas season in recent history
item.description: More than 17in of rain fell in Ventura county, with trees knocked down and hundreds of car crashes throughout region Southern Californians are facing ...

item.title: Equal pay settlements for female council workers pass £1bn
item.description: GMB union says 30,000 claims settled with six local councils for average of £30,000 and expects 10,000 more in 2026 Equal pay settlements for female w...

item.title: Poland preparing €2bn anti-drone fortifications along its eastern border amid Russian threat
item.description: Deputy defence minister says new air defence systems will be completed in 24 months Poland plans to complete a new set of anti-drone fortifications al...

item.title: 'Such an easy game to ref' - Dyche 'stunned' by 'bizarre' VAR calls
item.description: Nottingham Forest manager Sean Dyche is critical of the officials over some "bizarre" decisions in his side's late 2-1 defeat by Manchester City.

item.title: Kennedy Center seeks $1m from musician who cancelled after Trump name added to venue
item.description: Drummer Chuck Redd reportedly called off his Christmas Eve performance after a vote by the board to rename the site.

item.title: Arsenal in 'survival' mode as 'sensational' Raya save keeps them top
item.description: David Raya's "sensational" second-half save keeps Arsenal top of the Premier League - with the Gunners in "survival" mode.

item.title: 'He just needed more time' - Wirtz finally breaks Liverpool duck
item.description: Florian Wirtz finally scores his first goal for Liverpool in Saturday's win over Wolves - and shows he adapting to "the hardest league in the world".

item.title: Attack on Kyiv shows 'Russia doesn't want peace', Zelensky says
item.description: The 10-hour missile and drone barrage directed at Ukraine's capital killed two people and left 32 injured, local authorities say.
